definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: The coachman wrapped himself up in his cloak.
A cloak of raven feathers fluttered from his shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 渡鸦羽毛的斗篷在肩头上顺风飘动。

sentences.english: The long cloak she was wearing enveloped her completely.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着的斗篷把她全包裹起来了。

sentences.english: Bags and personal items may be left at the Cloakroom at Mezzanine level.
sentences.chinese: 书包与私人物件可被寄放在阁楼的‘斗篷室’。

sentences.english: And you will be clothed with my cloak cordiality, towards bloomy spring warm spring.
sentences.chinese: 而你将披戴着我的斗篷的情意，走向春暖花开的暖春。

sentences.english: He turned quickly, his black cloak circling .
sentences.chinese: 他麻利地转过身来，黑斗篷兜着圈圈。

sentences.english: I'm wearing a cape and some fake plastic fangs.
sentences.chinese: 我穿上斗篷和戴上假的塑料尖牙。

sentences.english: The man wearing the cape is the leader, and he wants them to come to the bottom of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 披着斗篷的男人才是领导，他希望她们到山脚下来。

sentences.english: Moody's magical eye could see through Invisibility Cloaks.
sentences.chinese: 穆迪教授的魔眼可以看穿隐形斗篷。

sentences.english: Most of the invisibility cloaks that have been demonstrated to date conceal objects at frequencies that are not detectable by the human eye.
sentences.chinese: 大部分隐身斗篷都是在非可见光波段隐藏物体。

sentences.english: The hills and dales are stripped of mantles of snow.
sentences.chinese: 山冈和山谷脱去了积雪的斗篷。

sentences.english: The men's long cloaks flapped around their ankles as they marched.
sentences.chinese: 两人大步行走，长长的斗篷拍打着他们的脚踝。

sentences.english: Ok guys for fans of naruto, here a cloaks with pictures.
sentences.chinese: 确定家伙火影忍者的球迷，在这里用图片的斗篷。

sentences.english: She was cloaked in red silk.
She wore a silver-grey jacket and a bordeaux red cloak, so was I.
sentences.chinese: 她穿一身银灰色夹克服，披一件枣红色斗篷。

sentences.english: Jon drew his cloak about himself more tightly.
sentences.chinese: 琼恩把斗篷卷得更紧了。

definition: Chinese-style long robe worn as outermost garment/burqa
long gown/cheongsam/traditional Asian dress for men or (in Hong Kong) women's qipao
cape/shawl/(of long hair) to trail over one's shoulders
